summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements over a portion of Meridian Avenue North in Section 31, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; a portion of Meridian Avenue North in the northwest one-quarter of Section 32, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.m.; a portion of North 100th Street in Section 32, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for sanitary sewer, storm drain, watermain and hydrant purposes. (Vacation, Corliss Avenue North, et al; City Comptroller's File No. 269095)
